column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Monday June 1 at 6:30 a.m.

column3: Traffic Advisory - S Broadway at Burley Ave / Water Main Repair:
column4: The inbound right lane of S Broadway is blocked, and access to Burley Ave is shutdown (with detour in place) until further notice.

column3: Traffic Advisory - S Broadway at Burley Ave / Water Main Repair:
column4: A water main leak has undermined a portion of Burley Ave.

column3: Traffic Advisory - S Broadway at Burley Ave / Water Main Repair:
column4: Traffic impact is expected to be light to moderate.  Use added caution if traveling in this area.
